scripts.deploy:cloud: cp wrangler.cloud.toml wrangler.toml && PRODUCT=cloud opennextjs-cloudflare build && PRODUCT=cloud opennextjs-cloudflare deploy
scripts.upload:cloud: cp wrangler.cloud.toml wrangler.toml && PRODUCT=cloud opennextjs-cloudflare build && opennextjs-cloudflare upload
scripts.preview:cloud: cp wrangler.cloud.toml wrangler.toml && PRODUCT=cloud opennextjs-cloudflare build && opennextjs-cloudflare preview
